title: New UPI QR Code Scam Detected
description: Fraudsters are creating fake UPI QR codes that redirect payments to their accounts instead of legitimate merchants.

title: Aadhaar Update Phishing Campaign
description: Mass email campaign targeting Indian citizens with fake UIDAI update requests. Uses lookalike domains.

title: Fake Delivery SMS Surge
description: Increase in SMS messages claiming failed deliveries from major courier services, leading to credential harvesting sites.

title: Banking App Impersonation
description: Malicious apps mimicking popular Indian banking applications discovered on unofficial app stores.

title: WhatsApp Business Verification Scam
description: Scammers impersonating WhatsApp support asking for verification codes to hijack business accounts.
